## Business Verification using the Business Registration Service Advance.

An endpoint to fetch and verify business details using Business Registration Service Advance
It is a means of identification that contains robust information of an individual .


**POST**
 `{{url}}/kenya_kyc/lookup_brs_advance`


#### Payload
```json
{
    "companyId": "ABC/2010/000111",
    "checkType": "CR12" // CR12, CR13, LLP
}
```

200 OK Response

```json
{
  "success": true,
  "statusCode": 200,
  "message": "Business Registration Service Advance Details retrieved",
  "response_code": "00",
  "data": {
    "company": "John Doe Ventured",
    "company_number": "ABC/2010/000111",
    "nominal_share_capital": "160,000.00",
    "number_and_type_of_shares_(value_per_share)": "ORDINARY: 1600 (KES 100.00 EACH)",
    "date_of_registration": "18TH OCT, 2016",
    "registered_office": "P.O BOX 20816 KENYATTA N.HOSPITAL TELEPHONE: +25491234567, EMAIL: INFO@EXAMPLE.COM COUNTY: NAIROBI, DISTRICT: WESTLANDS DISTRICT , LOCALITY: WESTLANDS STREET: ST DALLA ROAD, BUILDING: 50",
    "postal_address": "P.O BOX 9087 KENYATTA N.HOSPITAL",
    "encumbrances": "",
    "directors": [
      {
        "name": "JOHN DOE",
        "description": "DIRECTOR",
        "address": "P.O BOX 11034 KENYATTA N.HOSPITAL",
        "nationality": "KENYAN",
        "shares": "ORDINARY: 1600"
      }
    ],
    "file_base64": ""
  }
}
```
